synopsis.text: Kirigoe Mima, a beloved pop singer, leaves her successful music group, CHAM!, to chase her dreams of becoming an actress. However, her new role in a provocative crime drama pushes her fans and her own sanity to the brink. As she grapples with her transition, a sinister stalker begins to threaten her life and those around her. Paranoia sets in as Mima's reality blurs with her delusions, and an eerie website seems to know her every move. With the line between fantasy and reality becoming increasingly indistinguishable, Mima must confront her deepest fears and uncover the identity of her stalker before it's too late. This psychological thriller will keep you on the edge of your seat as Mima fights to maintain her grip on reality and protect those she cares about.
